title: Extrarakeback
author: Extrarakeback

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Quote from: Extrarakeback on August 06, 2022, 04:39:08 AMWe then pay you back the majority of this commission which it will be transferred to your Litecoin address (we use Litecoin for lower transfer fees ) every week .Keep in mind that your playing conditions (including house edge) remain exactly the same as if you had opened the account directly with the casino, so in effect, you're reducing the house edge and improving profitability.Welcome aboard. So this sounds like cashback through a third party. But what is exactly thr percentage of the commission of this majority you're saying. Also, what's the assurance of these users who registered through your link will get paid by you. I know some of the casino pays affiliates monthly, quarterly or etc.

comments.author: Extrarakeback
comments.body: Quote from: PX-Z on August 06, 2022, 04:48:39 AMQuote from: Extrarakeback on August 06, 2022, 04:39:08 AMWe then pay you back the majority of this commission which it will be transferred to your Litecoin address (we use Litecoin for lower transfer fees ) every week .Keep in mind that your playing conditions (including house edge) remain exactly the same as if you had opened the account directly with the casino, so in effect, you're reducing the house edge and improving profitability.Welcome aboard. Also, what's the assurance of these users who registered through your link will get paid by you. I know some of the casino pays affiliates monthly, quarterly or etc.Hi  . All the casinos supported for now pays instantly. None of them pay monthly.If you check the website each casino have it's percentage it's based on the house edge.  Please check the site first so you gonna understand.What insurance you talk about ? It's a win win situation and we don't ask anyone for money it's a free service and anyone who wants extra Rakeback welcome. If you join through us or through the casino directlyIt's the same house edge. Just through us you get some of that edge back. If you suspecious please join through the site directly it's simple. And if you interested please check the promo. For the first 10 members

If you still have questions please just edit your previous post. Or send me message will answer it. Please don't spam my posts with repeat questions or nonsense.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Quote from: Extrarakeback on August 06, 2022, 05:11:21 AMSo you mean I should pay people upfront? It doesn't make sense.  You may, after the user registered and wager. You may also get your funds escrowed to some reputed here just to let people know that you're serious of paying people when they registered > wager through your linkQuote from: Extrarakeback on August 06, 2022, 05:11:21 AMThe only logical answer to your question is : they free to not join .Well, these are one of the cons of claiming to pay someone by doing by almost nothing or free. Well, it's not actually free since this is an affiliate based those who registered and wagered, simply helped you.Quote from: Extrarakeback on August 06, 2022, 05:11:21 AMPlease don't spam my posts with repeat questions or nonsense.There's no repeated questions asked. I'm here to clear something that people may ask the same questions. I'm not discouraging you for doing your service or so you are all very welcome here. It just that you are new here and have zero reputation at all. Even new licensed casinos are being asked here how much more someone unknown and not regulated by any authorities.

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: This is same service with givemetron but you use Litecoin instead. The idea is same and it’s brilliant if you are indeed paying commission automatically but the other service that started this first failed give a payment on time. I know that there’s no risk on using your service because most of the players don’t benefits on this referral commission since casino never allowed self referral. I just hope that you guys will provide honest service so that players will not waste time just to give you the commission from our bets.Why not hire an escrow and provide funds as insurance for players safety. You will do this if you are confident that your service is legit. This will boost confidence of customers to use your service.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: Extrarakeback on August 06, 2022, 06:43:20 AMIs my post getting spammed with signature posters? Do not expect people will just be interested without questioning and some people might against you, that is how a place like forum works, but if is your site and service are not meant to be a scam, it is a good one.But your site is just a day old and some people do not prefer new sites but I do not know how this can result to scam except you are directing users to a fake website using a fake link to the gambling sites they want to register, which is what users need to be careful about. Your first site listed is stake.bet, but the original one is https://stake.com. Can you explain why it is so?

If you think that a post is spam, report it to a moderator, but don't get your hopes up, we are not inclined to censor anything here. If you don't like it, get the fuck out of here!

comments.author: fiulpro
comments.body: The fact is, you would actually be giving this cashback to those people " personally " which means there might not be any assurance of such things happening 100% of the time. At the end of the day, if you access any particular website through a third party you can always risk sharing any private information as well. Other than that if you guys do have good reviews then you should mention them here because it would help players trust you guys more, it's not easy gaining that at all especially in this market as well, so I would advice you to make it a bit better, focus on good advertising at the moment as well.

comments.author: panjul07
comments.body: Quote from: Oshosondy on August 06, 2022, 06:57:05 AMYour first site listed is stake.bet, but the original one is https://stake.com. Can you explain why it is so?Stake.bet is one the official mirror sites/links for stake.com as you can check https://playstake.io/ Perhaps the original one stake.com is blocked by his ISP like me, that's why he use stake.bet (I usually use stake.games). If I understand it correctly, this site (extrarakeback) is offering additional rakeback and it seems it will be paid from the affiliate commission he earn. Lets say I register through his referral link then I play/wager, he will earn some commission from the affiliate program and he will share his affiliate commission with me. I've seen this type of offer many times out there and I'm not that interested since I have my own gambling account.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Quote from: panjul07 on August 06, 2022, 03:23:42 PMStake.bet is one the official mirror sites/links for stake.com as you can check https://playstake.io/ Perhaps the original one stake.com is blocked by his ISP like me, that's why he use stake.bet (I usually use stake.games).I can see that too, stake.bet is also taking people to stake.com official website, it is not fake.Quote from: panjul07 on August 06, 2022, 03:23:42 PMIf I understand it correctly, this site (extrarakeback) is offering additional rakeback and it seems it will be paid from the affiliate commission he earn. Lets say I register through his referral link then I play/wager, he will earn some commission from the affiliate program and he will share his affiliate commission with me. I've seen this type of offer many times out there and I'm not that interested since I have my own gambling account.I do not know how betting site affiliation works, if it is a one time payment or continuous payment on every bet gained or lost by the gambler referred to the betting site. But if it is one time payment, I do not think OP is right. I do not have to think twice, I will avoid this, but if the site links are legit, people trying it also will not lose, but I will prefer to use the official site, or people should be very sure they are not directed to a scam site.
